### French Language Training Services for the Centre for Health Promotion
#### Solicitation Number
1000246686

#### Notice Details

* Published Date: January 4, 2023
* Closing Date: February 6, 2023 at 14:00:00 EST
* Contract Status: Expiré
* End Date: Not Specified

#### Description
This solicitation is for a Standing Offer (SO) contract to provide French language training services to employees of the Centre for Health Promotion at the Public Health Agency of Canada. The training will focus on delivering French training (oral, reading and writing) and test preparation for staff of varying levels to assist employees in fulfilling their bilingual requirement. The training will take place either virtually or at the Centre's location of work in Ottawa, Ontario.

#### Solicitation Details

* This solicitation is conducted under the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).
* The procurement method is competitive - open bidding.
* The contract will have an initial term from the Standing Offer award to March 31, 2026, and includes two (2) one (1) year option periods.

#### Additional Opportunities
successfully bidders are expected to have expertise in French language training (oral, reading and writing) and test preparation. The hiring organization expects high level employees to be certified as Canadian Certified Second Language Instructor.
